docs.lead_paragraph: Bella Anderson, or Carrie Jones, the young woman who kidnapped Baby Marion Clarke two weeks ago to-day, is behind the bars in the Union County Jail, in Elizabeth, N.J., and the case, which has stirred the community as no other has since the kidnapping of Charlie Ross twenty-five years ago, has been cleared up, if the confession of the Anderson girl is to be believed.

headline.main: PLOT OF KIDNAPPERS GRADUALLY UNFOLDS; The Barrows Had Planned to Steal Many Children. INTENDED TO ASK RANSOM Bella Anderson Was to be the Tool in Each Instance. The Nurse Who Took the Clarke Baby Is Held to Await Action by the New York Officials.
